name: H. Upmann - LCDH (La Casa Del Habano) - Noellas
additionalNotes:
Herman Upmann was a German banker whose fondness for Habanos led him to settle in Havana in 1840 and found a bank and a Habanos factory in this city in 1844. Over time, the bank closed, but his brand of cigars persists today as an example of the most refined Habanos with a medium strength in its 
The gold medals that adorn the H. Upmann box were obtained at no fewer than eleven international fairs throughout the 19th century, as a reward for their quality and inimitable aroma. The Habanos Collection continues to be one of the most anticipated special releases each year by loyal lovers of what is considered the best tobacco in the world. H. Upmann Collection, is one of the benchmarks within the most refined Habanos with a mild to medium strength in its flavor.
